originalTitle: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
title: Trump threatens to sue Trevor Noah over Epstein joke at Grammys
content: The US president labels Noah a "total loser" over a joke he told on stage during the awards ceremony.

originalTitle: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
title: Eighty kidnapped Nigerians return home after escape
content: They were among 177 people seized last month from three churches in northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
title: South African singer Tyla edges out Davido to clinch Grammy
content: The 24-year-old bagged her second-ever Grammy beating three Nigerians and a Ugandan.

originalTitle: Getting resources for Sudan is a ‘race against time’
title: Getting resources for Sudan is a ‘race against time’
content: ‘Lack of resources in Sudan is very worrying’

originalTitle: How Balochistan attacks threaten Pakistan’s promises to China, Trump
title: How Balochistan attacks threaten Pakistan’s promises to China, Trump
content: Balochistan is at the heart of Pakistan's economic promises to US and China. The attacks are a reminder of the risks.

originalTitle: Israel’s Rafah border scheme risks Gaza patients’ lives
title: Israel’s Rafah border scheme risks Gaza patients’ lives
content: Israel is “reopening” Gaza's Rafah border crossing but limiting transit to 50 patients daily.

originalTitle: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
title: Norway's PM agrees crown princess had 'poor judgement' over Epstein links
content: Jonas Gahr Støre says he agreed with Princess Mette-Marit's own remarks over her contacts with the late sex offender.

originalTitle: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
title: 'Do you think you're the devil himself?' Epstein questioned in newly released interview
content: The footage, which is part of millions of files released by the US Department of Justice, shows the late sex offender being questioned by an unnamed interviewer.

originalTitle: 'Enemy' insults and questioning Putin: Steve Rosenberg on tightrope of reporting from Russia
title: 'Enemy' insults and questioning Putin: Steve Rosenberg on tightrope of reporting from Russia
content: The BBC's Russia editor reflects on the difficulties of working as a British journalist in Moscow.

originalTitle: Jacquet set for Liverpool medical before £60m summer move
title: Jacquet set for Liverpool medical before £60m summer move
content: Liverpool agree a £60m deal with Rennes for defender Jeremy Jacquet, with the player set to join the Reds in the summer.

originalTitle: Mateta's move from Palace to Milan in doubt
title: Mateta's move from Palace to Milan in doubt
content: Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta's move to AC Milan is in serious doubt over issues with his medical, according to multiple BBC Sport sources.

originalTitle: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
title: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
content: Fulham reject an offer from Everton for Harry Wilson, with the midfielder set to be out of contract this summer.
